titleStmt.title: The declaration of the Hungarian war lately set out by the most illustrious Michael Apafi, Prince of Transilvania, against the Emperour's S. Majesty : according to the Transylvanian copy, anno 1682.
Declaratio belli Hungarici. English & Latin
titleStmt.author: Transylvania (Principality). Sovereign (1661-1690 : Apafi Mihály I)
Apafi Mihály I, Prince of Transylvania, 1632-1690.

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. in Latin: Declaratio belli Hungarici : nuper edita a serenissimo Michaele Apafio, Principe Transylvaniae, contra S. Caesaream Majestatem : ad exemplum Transylvaniense, anno 1682.
Latin and English in parallel columns.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
